ValidationRule.description: Requirement :3784- Merge Sales Process VRs #2 Req 4371: G6 Planned Date should never be blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( AND( OR( ISCHANGED(G3_Planned_Date__c ), ISNEW() ), OR( AND( !ISBLANK(G4_Planned_Date__c), G3_Planned_Date__c > G4_Planned_Date__c ), OR( G3_Planned_Date__c < Today(), G3_Planned_Date__c > G5_Planned_Date__c ) ) ), AND( !ISBLANK(G4_Planned_Date__c), OR( ISCHANGED(G4_Planned_Date__c ), ISNEW() ), OR( G4_Planned_Date__c > G5_Planned_Date__c, G4_Planned_Date__c < G3_Planned_Date__c, G4_Planned_Date__c < Today() ) ), AND( OR( ISCHANGED(G5_Planned_Date__c ), ISNEW() ), OR( AND( !ISBLANK(G4_Planned_Date__c), G5_Planned_Date__c < G4_Planned_Date__c ), OR( G5_Planned_Date__c < G3_Planned_Date__c, G5_Planned_Date__c < Today() ) ) ), AND( ISCHANGED(G6_Planned_Date__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Handover (Prepare for Delivery)'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Execute (Start Delivery)'), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Completed') ), OR( G6_Planned_Date__c < Today(), ISBLANK(G6_Planned_Date__c) ) ) ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Gate Planned Date entered is either blank, in the past, precedes the date entered for the previous gate or exceeds the date entered for the following gate.
